resources.string:
Welcome to Eggs Store, your number one source for quality eggs. We\'re dedicated to giving you the very best of eggs, with a focus on dependability, customer service and uniqueness. We serve customers all over South Africa and we are thrilled to be a part of the quirky, eco-friendly, fair trade wing of the eggs industry.
\n\n We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don\'t hesitate to contact us.
